law.text:
An individual has the immunity from liability described in § 5-513 of the Courts Article if the individual is:
a member of a court-martial; or
an officer or other individual:
acting under the court's authority; or
reviewing the court's proceedings because of the approval, imposition, or execution of a sentence, the imposition or collection of a fine or penalty, or the execution of a warrant, writ, execution, process, or mandate of a court-martial.
